Package br.ufrn.imd.controller

Class Game

java.lang.Object
br.ufrn.imd.controller.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class represents a game of Natalha Baval. It manages the tables, players, and turns of the game.

      public boolean shoot(int x, int y)
      Shoots at the specified coordinates on the opponent's table.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the target.
      y - The y-coordinate of the target.
      Returns:
      true if the shot was successful, false otherwise.
